instruction: Find out the most popular sport in Canada.
output: Ice hockey is Canada’s most popular sport, followed by soccer and lacrosse. Canadian participation in ice hockey leagues and events is among the highest in the world. Ice hockey is the official winter sport in Canada and is also one of the most recognizable sports in the world. The Stanley Cup is the country’s most prized professional hockey trophy. Canada is also home to a number of successful soccer teams and players. Lacrosse is the most popular team sport among Indigenous Canadians and has grown in popularity in recent years.
